Eminem - Mosh (Music Video)

2004-10-27


Eminem - Mosh

(alt link, .mov.torrent) -- i watched it this morning, and was fairly impressed with the animation... the song is good if you ignore the self-imporance, but the video is better. tho a little late... but who knows? maybe the timing is perfect.
